thread.title: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses
thread.title_full: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses - Times Union

author: timesunion.com
title: ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses
text:
Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP Image 1 of / 2 Caption
Close
Image 1 of 2 Priyanka Chopra.
Photo: Chris Pizzello, Chris Pizzello/Invision/AP Priyanka Chopra. Image 2 of 2 Yukta Mookhey
Photo: STRDEL, Getty Images Yukta Mookhey ABC apologizes for mixing up video of Indian actresses 1 / 2 Back to Gallery LOS ANGELES (AP) â€” ABC's "Nightline" is apologizing for confusing new network star Priyanka Chopra with another Indian actress.
The news magazine aired a feature earlier this week about Chopra, the star of ABC's new drama "Quantico." A video shot supposedly showing Chopra in the Miss World pageant was included.
But the video was of Yukta Mookhey , who won the crown in 1999. Chopra was the 2000 Miss World winner.
The error was noted online by viewers, and ABC responded with an apology and posted a corrected version of the "Nightline" story online.
Chopra, a Bollywood star who plays an FBI recruit in "Quantico," responded to the mix-up on Twitter by posting "LOL" and linking to another post that read, "Uh oh, @Nightline!"
